Detailed Description

A COLLADA emitter instance.

As with geometric objects, the material assigned to the particles of an emitter is instance-dependant.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

FCDEmitterInstance::FCDEmitterInstance (  FCDocument *  document,
FCDSceneNode *  parent,
FCDEntity::Type  entityType = FCDEntity::CONTROLLER
) 
 

Constructor: do not use directly.

Instead, use the FCDSceneNode::AddInstance function.

Parameters:
document The COLLADA document that owns the emitter instance.
parent The parent visual scene node.
entityType The type of the entity to instantiate. Unless this class is overwritten, FCDEntity::CONTROLLER should be given.

Member Function Documentation

FCDMaterialInstance* FCDEmitterInstance::AddMaterialInstance (  FCDMaterial *  material,
FCDGeometryPolygons *  polygons = NULL
) 
 

Adds a new material instance.

Since the emitted particles may be meshes, an emitter instance may contain more than one material instance. In these cases, the rules for associating materials with geometries are applied as for FCDGeometryInstance objects.

Parameters:
material The instanced material. This pointer can be NULL.
polygons A polygon set of the instanced mesh to associated with the given material. This pointer can be NULL.
Returns:
The new material instance.

FCDMaterialInstance* FCDEmitterInstance::AddMaterialInstance (   ) 
 

Adds a new material instance.

Since the emitted particles may be meshes, an emitter instance may contain more than one material instance. In these cases, the rules for associating materials with geometries are applied as for FCDGeometryInstance objects.

Returns:
The new material instance.

virtual FCDEntityInstance* FCDEmitterInstance::Clone (  FCDEntityInstance *  clone = NULL  )  const [virtual]
 

Clones the emitter instance.

Parameters:
clone The emitter instance to become the clone. If this pointer is NULL, a new emitter instance will be created and you will need to release the returned pointer.
Returns:
The clone.

Reimplemented from FCDEntityInstance.

FCDMaterialInstance* FCDEmitterInstance::GetMaterialInstance (  size_t  index  )  [inline]
 

Retrieves a specific material instance from the list for this emitter instance.

Parameters:
index An index to a material instance.
Returns:
The indexed material instance. This pointer will be NULL if the given index is out-of-bounds.

size_t FCDEmitterInstance::GetMaterialInstanceCount (   )  const [inline]
 

Retrieves the number of material instances declared for this emitter instance.

Returns:
The number of material instances.

virtual bool FCDEmitterInstance::LoadFromExtra (  FCDENode *  instanceNode  )  [virtual]
 

[INTERNAL] Reads in the emitter instance from a given extra tree node.

Parameters:
instanceNode The extra tree node.
Returns:
The status of the import. If the status is 'false', it may be dangerous to extract information from the instance.

Returns:
The status of the import. If the status is 'false', it may be dangerous to use the emitter instance.
